snippet.title: Kyrat Edition Trailer  |  Far Cry 4 [UK]
snippet.description:
Visit the official website: http://www.farcrygame.com
Pre-order now on our store!: http://www.farcrygame.com/preorder

Discover now the Kyrat Edition content exclusively created to let you live an extended Far Cry experience!
